12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364656667686970<!DOCTYPE html><html lang="en"><head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <meta const changeState = (state,action) =>{ if(!state){ return countState } switch(action.type) { case 'JIAN': return{ ...state, count: state.count - action.n } case 'JIA': return{ ...state, count: state.count + action.n } default: return state } } const createStore = (changeState) => { let state = null const getState = () => state const listeners = [] const subscribe = (listener) =>
